anyone installed vhcs before?: there is an excellent installation script for vhcs2
it appears the script failed installing some component
is this an addition to a relatively matured server?
IOW: is this a server that has been built and added to for more than a week?
remove the temporary directory and restart the install
it should be in the same directory where you execute the vhcs2 script
that's a safety valve so the fs doesn't poof
vhcs is really picky about versions
